pageContent: Objective: To investigate the incidence of patient-reported erectile (ED) and sexual dysfunction and response to treatment in men after the induction of androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) for prostate cancer, as ADT-induced changes in serum testosterone can result in changes in libido and sexual function.

metaData.source:
Re: A Randomised Controlled Trial of a Couples-Based Sexuality Intervention for Men with Localised Prostate Cancer and their Female Partners
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26088241/
